txt.en: Never have you seen such a magnificent hide. The fur is thick and lush, unblemished by burrs or tangles. The blows that dispatched its former owner were well-enough aimed that the useable portion of the hide is unmarred. \n\nAn armourer of sufficient skill might make this hide into formidable armour. An Elf in Rivendell likely possesses both the skill and the desire to do this for you.

'This hide is truly magnificent, [placeholder], and you are equally so to have bested the mighty creature from which it came!\n\n'I would be honoured to craft fine armour from this hide, friend [placeholder]. Wear it with pride, and at no cost -- the honour of working with such fine materials is payment enough!'
While hunting the bears of the Bruinen Gorges, you obtained a hide of unusual toughness. The beast from which it came was strong and hardy, possessed of thick fur and even thicker hide.
Bring the perfect bear-hide to an Elf armourer in Rivendell

An armourer of sufficient skill likely dwells in the hidden valley of Rivendell, far to the east of the Bruinen Gorges, across the Ford of Bruinen and beyond.\n\nIt will take an armourer of great skill to craft armour worthy of the beast from which this perfect hide came.
